summary: The diff adds a TanStack Router-based multi-page frontend with a consistent theme, Internet Identity sign-in/out UX, Activity 1 & 2 interactive pages (with gated submission), and a Motoko backend actor with submission/query APIs. However, some requirements cannot be verified from the provided diff (notably Session Outline/Takeaways pages), and Activity 2 submissions are not attributed to the caller Principal in the backend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Associate saved submissions with the authenticated user’s Principal for Activities 1 and 2.
missing_requirements.reason: Activity 2 backend storage does not record the caller Principal; it stores only the activity content in a list without any Principal attribution.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a “Session Outline” view that presents the provided timeline with specified durations, formatted for facilitating the workshop.
missing_requirements.reason: A Session Outline route is wired, but the actual SessionOutlinePage implementation/content (including agenda items and minute durations) is not shown in the diff summary, so it cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide navigable pages for all required sections (including Takeaways and Session Outline) with English text reflecting the provided proposal content.
missing_requirements.reason: Routes are defined for Takeaways and Session Outline, but the actual page implementations/content are not included in the visible diff summary, so compliance with proposal-based content cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the required filenames, but the actual image files are not present in the visible diff summary (likely omitted/truncated), so their existence cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend API to fetch all Leadership Word submissions including Principals (getAllLeadershipWordSubmissions).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest/requirements; REQ-6 only requires aggregated word counts and Activity 2 micro-solution listing.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend API getTopLeadershipWords that duplicates word-count retrieval without implementing a distinct 'top' selection/sorting.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (REQ-6 only requires aggregated word counts; frontend can compute top words).
